name: NeonNest
description: A compact, self-healing energy hub designed to provide sustained power to cybernetic devices. NeonNest acts as a portable energy source that charges devices while also healing minor injuries or malfunctions.

flavor.rationale: In a cyberpunk setting, where devices often require continuous power without the luxury of frequent refueling, NeonNest serves as an essential companion for players navigating through hostile environments. Its self-healing properties make it invaluable for maintaining operational integrity in challenging scenarios.
